alert.note: Alert for Southern Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 04 at 9:01AM CDT until October 04 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Southern Calcasieu, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary Parishes. In Texas, Southern Orange County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
